homepage.title: Elections to the Silicon Hill Club Board

step0.label: Election announcement
step0.description: Elections are announced by the chairman of Silicon Hill club.

step1.label: Candidate registration
step1.description: Only a SH member who is not simultaneously a member of the election committee can run for the club board. It is possible to run for only one position at a time. Registration is done electronically via email to the election committee at volby@sh.cvut.cz from a club email address. This means an address in the siliconhill.cz or sh.cvut.cz domain.

step2.label: Election campaign
step2.description: Election campaign means any promotion of a candidate or electoral agitation in favor of a candidate.

step3.label: Electronic voting
step3.description: Electronic voting is in progress. Anyone who is a member of Silicon Hill club and has active basic membership can vote.

step4.label: Ballot box voting
step4.description: Physical voting is only possible during the designated time. More information about ballot box voting can be found in the resolution.

step5.label: Preliminary results announcement
step5.description: Complaints about the course of elections can be sent to volby@sh.cvut.cz.

step6.label: Complaint submission deadline
step6.description: It is no longer possible to submit complaints.

step8.label: Final results announcement
step8.description: Elections are concluded and final results are known.

election.noCandidates: No candidates have been registered yet.
election.noElections: No elections are currently in progress

information.title: Basic information
information.signInText1: Only a SH member who is not simultaneously a member of the election committee can run for the club board. It is possible to run for only one position at a time.
information.signInText2: Registration is done electronically via email to the election committee at volby@sh.cvut.cz from a club email address. This means an address in the siliconhill.cz or sh.cvut.cz domain.
information.validadCandidateApplication: A valid candidate application must contain:
information.skenedConsent: Scanned or photographed signed consent to candidacy
information.posterText1: Each candidate has the opportunity to send an information poster that will be displayed on these pages. Only the poster will be published, not video or audio.
information.posterText2: PDF format is recommended and preferred, and the recommended poster elements are – A4 format, personal data, photograph, contact email, reason for candidacy, election program, personal merits in Silicon Hill club, etc.
information.posterText3: The information poster should not attack or accuse other persons.
information.posterText4: In case the information poster does not meet the described requirements, the election committee may not accept it and will return it to the candidate for correction.
information.boardMembers: Silicon Hill Club board has up to 15 members:
information.boardMembersText2: Elected by all residents of the given block, club members can use the electronic version of voting.
information.boardMembersText3: They deal with club-wide matters as well as block problems. This involves maintaining the operation of services (network, interest rooms) and also ensuring dignified presentation of the opinions of accommodated/represented students (dissatisfaction with cleaning, troublemakers, block development). Close cooperation with the block housekeeper and technical-network manager is expected.
information.boardMembersText4: Elected only by club members in electronic voting.
information.boardMembersText5: They have no block affiliation, so they are not burdened with concerns about a specific block and can fully dedicate themselves to further development of student activities in the dormitories.
information.chairmanDescription: Represents the club externally, but should not be the only active component.
